title: Douglass on Fourth of July - Purpose

content.prompt: Which of the following was a key purpose of the excerpt?

choices.label: To encourage revolts among enslaved people
To support colonization for free Black people
To advocate for reparation payments for formerly enslaved people
To condemn the conflict between American ideals and practices

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
